text: Nicholas Amponsah (born 9 July 1997) is a Ghanaian footballer who plays as a defender for Chattanooga Red Wolves SC in USL League One. ==Career== Amponsah played for Jamaican club Montego Bay United before signing for the Chattanooga Red Wolves.MBU's African connection wants to leave legacy jamaicaobserver.com ==References== == External links == * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Montego Bay United F.C. players Category:Chattanooga Red Wolves SC players Category:USL League One players Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:People from Ashanti Region
title: Nicholas Amponsah
